title.rendered: Polo Aviation in Bristol, United Kingdom

content.rendered:
Polo Aviation Ltd, has its Headquarters in Congresbury, less than 2 miles from Bristol Airport. We pride ourselves in providing a friendly and effective service to our clients whether you are chartering a helicopter for business, pleasure, filming, load lifting or aerial spraying. Polo Aviation Ltd was founded in 1994, and the senior management team has remained the same throughout that time giving the company a continuity of customer support. The company is approved by the Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) and maintains the required Air Operators Certificate (AOC) 2029.

Polo Aviation Address, Phone, Email, Working hours

Address: Polo Aviation Ltd,

Urchinwood Manor, Urchinwood Lane, Congresbury

North Somerset, BS49 5AP

Phone: 01934 877000

Email: mail@poloaviation.com

Polo Aviation Official website: http://www.poloaviation.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Polo Aviation

  • Bell Jetranger B206
  • Eurocopter AS350
  • Eurocopter AS355

Queries handled by Polo Aviation Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Polo Aviation Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Polo Aviation : (click on the stars below)
